name: seed-store
description: Full-stack inventory management and point-of-sale system with desktop application

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:desktop: npm run build && cd electron && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../electron && npm install
scripts.pack:desktop: npm run build && cd electron && npm run pack
scripts.dist:desktop: npm run build && cd electron && npm run dist
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.clean: npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server && npm run clean:electron

author: Seed Store Team
